title.rendered: 1. Wonders of the World Wide Web

acf.module_short_description: Before you become a successful SEO, you need to understand how the Internet and search engines work.
acf.module_long_description: Becoming a successful SEO requires an understanding of how the World Wide Web webs. In this module, we will discuss how the Internet works before taking a closer look at the three core phases of search engines: crawling, indexing and ranking before concluding with a brief look at how other search engines compare to Google.
